snippet.title: 2K Drive Dev Diary 2
snippet.description:
If you are excited for 2K's upcoming high-quality simulation racing title 2K Drive, be sure to check out our latest dev diary presenting the game's esteemed creators speaking to the incredible customization features in the game, including RaceFace, along with details on the realistic driving controls, in-depth boost system, and more!

2K Drive is on Facebook and Twitter!
https://www.facebook.com/2KDrive
https://twitter.com/2kdrive
